title: Benghuai 3rd: Chunzhen Meng Ge PV

alternative_titles.en: Dreamy Euphony Online Concert Animated Trailer - Honkai Impact 3rd
alternative_titles.ja: 《崩壞3rd》「純真夢歌」線上音樂會預告動畫

synopsis:
Familiar tunes resonate in our dreamland.
Dance! A myriad of musical notes converge to become spectacular fireflies that illuminate our collective memories.

(Source: Official Honkai Impact 3rd YouTube channel)
